tgt_original: na te, tasya hemno na bāhyā oṣadhyas tantrāntaroktā ity uddeśaṃ nirdiśati na cāpītyādi |
iti |  abhayapaddhatyāṃ navamaḥ paṭalaḥ ||  (3) 10 divyamahauṣadhivandhyāsnānavidhipaṭala 1 parānugrahaparasya tadupāyaṃ vaktum āha- athetyādi |
sattvārthaikasuniścayam iti sattvānām artha ekaḥ suṣṭhu niścīyate yasmin |
2 pravālasya, pravālam |  yeneti hemnā |  muktādibhir dhanair dhanavanto yānti bhavanti |
